languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает на ведьм взгляд, в котором плещется океан бессильной ярости. Мгновение спустя он смотрит на вас. Выражение его лица чуть меняется, одна бровь изгибается, словно он пытается принять какое-то мучительное решение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас взгляд, в котором плещется океан бессильной ярости. Выражение его лица чуть меняется, он едва слышно выдыхает:{/n} "Продолжай".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай бросает на ведьм взгляд, в котором плещется океан бессильной ярости. Мгновение спустя он смотрит на вас. Выражение его лица чуть меняется, одна бровь изгибается, словно он пытается принять какое-то мучительное решение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}
{n}Marazhai gives you a look filled with an ocean of powerless rage. There is a subtle change in his expression, and he mutters faintly,{/n} "Go on."

{n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}
{n}Marazhai gives you a look filled with a sea of powerless rage. There is a subtle change in his expression and he mutters faintly,{/n} "Go on."

{n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

{n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

{n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lance aux Cérastes un regard débordant de rage et d'impuissance, puis il se tourne vers vous et son expression change légèrement : il hausse un sourcil, comme s'il essayait de prendre une décision extrêmement difficile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous adresse un regard débordant de rage et d'impuissance. Vous décelez un changement subtil dans son attitude et il murmure :{/n}« Je vous écoute. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋瞥了巫灵一眼，眼神中充斥着无力的愤怒。过了一会儿，他看着你，表情发生了微妙的变化。他扬起了一条眉毛，仿佛正在做着某个令他痛苦的决定。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看了你一眼，眼神中充斥着无能的狂怒。随后，他的表情发生了微妙的变化，低声说了句。{/n}“继续说。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはウィッチたちをちらりと見て、無力な怒りに満ちた目をしている。すかさず彼はあなたを見る。彼の表情はわずかに変わり、まるで苦渋の決断をしようとしているかのように、一方の眉が上がる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが無力な怒りに満ちた顔であなたを見た。その表情にかすかな変化が浮かぶ中、彼は小さくつぶやいた。{/n}「続けろ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirft den Hektari einen Blick zu ... in seinen Augen brodelt ein Meer aus machtloser Wut. Einen Augenblick später sieht er dich an. Seine Miene ändert sich unmerklich. Er hebt eine Augenbraue, als würde er eine schmerzliche Entscheidung treffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt dich mit machtlosem Zorn an. Es kommt zu einer feinen Veränderung in seinem Ausdruck und er murmelt leise:{/n} "Ich höre."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira de reojo a las brujas con un mar de rabia impotente en la mirada. Unos instantes después, fija sus ojos en los tuyos. Su expresión sufre un leve cambio: una de sus cejas se alza, como si tratara de tomar una decisión extremadamente difícil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te dirige una mirada que rebosa una furia impotente. Se produce un sutil cambio en su expresión y murmura:{/n} «Continúa».

languages.text: {n}Viçlere bakan Marazhai'ın gözlerinde biçare bir öfke kabarıyor. Hemen ardından sana dönüyor ve ifadesi belli belirsiz değişiyor. Zor bir karar vermeye çalışıyormuşçasına bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glances at the Wyches, his eyes brimming with a sea of powerless rage. A moment later, he looks at you. His expression changes slightly, one eyebrow arching as if he is trying to make some agonising decision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Viçlere bakan Marazhai'ın gözlerinde biçare bir öfke kabarıyor. Hemen ardından sana dönüyor ve ifadesi belli belirsiz değişiyor. Zor bir karar vermeye çalışıyormuşçasına bir kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n}
